account_suspended: Account has been suspended or deactivated
achievement_fully_boosted_desc: Have all boosts active at once
achievement_market_crash_desc: Sell all your coins at high
achievement_quarantined_desc: Remove viruses from an infected file
achievement_serial_breacher_desc: Breach Anonymous, Corporations and the Government in under 1 second
achievement_stylist_desc: Use all Node Groups colours simultaneously
achievement_trojan_desc: Upload a file with a trojan
achievement_wasted_effort_desc: Compress an enhanced file or vice-versa
boost_bandwidth_desc: Doubles Download and Upload Speed for 10 minutes
credits_desc:

guide_breach_desc:
Breach enables you to infiltrate and compromise various entities to acquire valuable spoils.

[h]Breaching[/h]
[l]Initiating an Attack:[/l] Build up and send a Payload Damage using Hack Power.
[l]Timer:[/l] Attacking a target will alert it, initiating a countdown timer.

If you successfully breach the target before the timer expires, you will receive rewards. If the timer runs out before the breach is complete, you will fail, and the target will recover from the attack.
Successfully breaching a target also increases its maximum Threat Level. Higher threat levels mean the target will be more challenging to breach in the future but will also offer exponentially greater rewards.

[h]Progression[/h]
[l]Leveling Up:[/l] Gaining Hacking Experience allows you to level up your Hack Power.
[l]Hack Points:[/l] Leveling up also rewards you with Hack Points. These points can be spent to improve your breaching skills.
[l]Breach Skills:[/l] Breach Skills are nodes that share capacity and can strategically improve your breaching powers.

[h]Targets & Rewards[/h]
[l]Anonymous:[/l] Rewards you with Hacking Experience.
[l]Corporations:[/l] Grants Corporation Data.
[l]Government:[/l] Yields Government Intel.

[h]Bank Breaching[/h]
[l]Token Rewards:[/l] Successfully breaching a Bank rewards you with Tokens.
[l]Persistent Threat:[/l] Bank's threat level cannot be changed and does not reset even after you enter the Portal.
guide_connections_desc:
Connections are links that manage the flow of resources between nodes. They are established by linking an output from one node to inputs of other nodes.

[h]Creating Connections[/h]
To create a connection, simply drag from an output connector to an input connector. To delete a connection, drag an input that is currently connected.

[h]Connection Rules[/h]
[l]Outputs:[/l] An output can distribute its resource to multiple inputs.
[l]Inputs:[/l] An input can only receive resources from a single output.
[l]Shape and Color:[/l] For a connection to be valid, the output and input connectors must share the same shape and color.
[l]White Connectors:[/l] White connectors are universal. They can accept a connection from any color of connector, provided the shape still matches.
[l]Specific Requirements:[/l] Be aware that some inputs have specific resource requirements. Even if the shape and color of the connectors match, the input may only accept a particular type of resource.
guide_file_modifiers_ai:  AI: Reduces quality by 10x, but increases value by 1000000x
guide_file_modifiers_corrupted:  Corrupted: Reduces size by 5x and value by 10x
guide_file_modifiers_enhanced:  Enhanced: Increases quality and size by 2x
guide_file_modifiers_trojan:  Trojan-Injected: Grants Infected Computer on upload based on the file's quality
guide_files_desc:
Files are a type of resource within the system, identifiable by their square connector shape. They come in different formats, each with a distinct value and size.

[h]Characteristics[/h]
[l]Value:[/l] Each format has its own base value, which dictates how much Money is granted on upload.
[l]Size:[/l] Each format also has its own size in bits.
[l]Quality:[/l] Files gain quality when they undergo certain processes. Each quality multiplicatively increases the file's value and other outcomes.

[h]Processes & Modifications[/h]
Files are not static; they can undergo several processes to alter their characteristics, such as value, size, and quality. Any modifications made to a file are visually indicated by symbols displayed alongside its name.
guide_nodes_desc:
Nodes are interactive windows that can be placed on your desktop. Each node represents a specific component or process within your system.

[h]Functionality[/h]
Nodes serve two primary functions:
[l]Resource generation:[/l] Some nodes produce new resources.
[l]Resource transformation:[/l] Other nodes take resources as input and transform them into different resources as output.

[h]Example[/h]
A Network node provides Download Speed, which can be connected to a Downloader node, generating a file. A File Scanner can then take the file and scan it, generating a scanned file with improved value.

[h]Limits[/h]
Certain types of nodes have a limit on how many of itself can be active simultaneously.
Other types of nodes can be placed without restrictions.

[h]Adding nodes[/h]
New nodes can be added to your desktop by pressing the button located at the bottom center of your screen.
guide_portal_desc:
The Portal functions as a prestige mechanic. Entering the Portal allows you to reset your game progress in exchange for an array of upgrades of your choice.

[h]Functionality[/h]
[l]Advanced Research:[/l] Get Advanced Research by inserting Research in an Advanced Research node. Each Advanced Research acquired increases Research requirement for the next point by 1.5x.
[l]Queueing Upgrades:[/l] You can queue portal upgrades in the Portal screen using Advanced Research points. Queued upgrades will be activated once you enter the Portal.
[l]Progress Reset:[/l] Entering the Portal will restart your progression, including resources and node setups. All research done is saved.
guide_rest_time_desc:
Rest Time is a mechanic that allows you to accelerate your in-game progress by utilizing time spent offline.

[h]How it Works[/h]
[l]Accumulation:[/l] For every 72 seconds you are offline, you gain 1 second of Rest Time.
[l]Activation:[/l] When you return to the game, you can choose to activate your accumulated Rest Time.
[l]Effect:[/l] While Rest Time is active, the simulation speed of the game is increased by 5x.
[l]Storage:[/l] You can store a maximum of 600 seconds of Rest Time.

[h]Upgrades[/h]
The Rest Time system can be upgraded through perks, like increased storage or accumulation.
guide_tokens_desc:
Tokens are a special currency of high scarcity.

[h]Uses[/h]
[l]Perks:[/l] Offer permanent enhancements, either by boosting your performance or unlocking new nodes.
[l]Boosts:[/l] Provides a short-term advantage.
[l]Services:[/l] Allows to revert specific choices, such as refunding Hack Points

[h]Acquisition[/h]
[l]Collecting Spawns:[/l] Tokens periodically appear throughout the desktop.
[l]Completing Achievements:[/l] Unlocking achievements will reward you with tokens.
[l]Fulfilling Upload Requests:[/l] Completing upload requests is another way to earn tokens.
[l]In-App Purchases:[/l] Tokens can also be acquired through in-app purchases.
guide_window_agi: Outputs AI Power based on the lowest Neuron count inserted.
guide_window_analyzer:
Pre-analyzes files using Clock Speed, adding the pre-analyed modifier and reducing the time it takes to be researched in a Data Lab by 2x.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the file size.
guide_window_antivirus_pro:
Scans and removes viruses from files using Clock Speed, adding the scanned modifier and increasing its value by 4x.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the file size.
guide_window_breach_anonymous: Breach target. Insert any damage to attempt to breach the anonymous during the time limit. If you are successful, you will receive Hack Experience. Successfully breaching the Anonymous at its maximum threat level will also raise its maximum threat level, increasing difficulty and rewards.
guide_window_breach_bank: Breach target. Insert any damage to attempt to breach banks during the time limit. If you are successful, you will receive Tokens and will also raise its maximum threat level permanently, increasing difficulty. Completing or failing the breach will cause the node to collapse.
guide_window_breach_corps: Breach target. Insert any damage to attempt to breach corporations during the time limit. If you are successful, you will receive Corporation Data. Successfully breaching corporations at its maximum threat level will also raise its maximum threat level, increasing difficulty and rewards.
guide_window_breach_government: Breach target. Insert any damage to attempt to breach the government during the time limit. If you are successful, you will receive Government Intel. Successfully breaching the government at its maximum threat level will also raise its maximum threat level, increasing difficulty and rewards.
guide_window_build: Builds a project based on inserted code. Completing projects will reward you with unique upgrades.
guide_window_build_infection:
Builds up Infection Damage based on 20% of Hack Power. 
Damages breach targets without being consumed, leading to constant damage over time.
guide_window_code_application: Makes an Application Code through required variables: Array[String], Array[BigInt].
guide_window_code_array: Codes an array of the inserted variables
guide_window_code_bugfix: Makes a Bug Fix Code through required variables: bool, int.
guide_window_code_driver: Makes a Driver Code through required variables: HashMap[Decimal], HashMap[Vector].
guide_window_code_hashmap: Codes a hashmap of the inserted array using an array of string
guide_window_code_optimization: Makes an Optimization Code through required variables: BitFlag, Vector.
guide_window_code_variable: Codes a primitive type variable using Code Speed.
guide_window_coder: Provides Code Speed based on your Contribution Level. Contribution Level can be upgraded by inserting Contribution.
guide_window_commit: Commits inserted code in exchange for Contribution. Reward is based on the code complexity and its modifiers.
guide_window_compiler:
Makes Program files out of Texts using Clock Speed. Resulting programs inherits modifiers from used texts.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the program size.
guide_window_compressor:
Compresses files using Clock Speed, adding the compressed modifier and reducing its size by 2x.
Removes one enhancement modifier.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the file size and is not affected by compression modifiers.
guide_window_data_lab: Consumes files to generate Research, with the output quantity and type determined by the incoming file's format and quality, operating at a set files-per-second consumption rate which can be upgraded with Money to increase processing speed.
guide_window_debug:
Debugs inserted code, adding the tested modifier and increasing code quality by 4x. Codes have a 50% chance of also having the bugged modifier, which reduces quality by 4x.
The amount of operations (ops) required is based on the inserted code.
guide_window_decompiler:
Decompiles Program files using Clock Speed, outputting 2m Text files.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the program size.
guide_window_decomposer:
Decomposes Video files using Clock Speed, outputting 20k Image files. 
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the video size.
guide_window_decryptor:
Decrypts files using Clock Speed, replacing the encrypted modifier with decrypted, removing the 0x quality multiplier and increasing quality by 4x.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 4x the file size.
guide_window_demuxer:
Demuxes Video files using Clock Speed, outputting 200 Sound files.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the video size.
guide_window_distillator:
Distills files using Clock Speed, adding the distilled modifier and increasing neuron yield when training by 2x.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the file size.
guide_window_drain: Drains performance from inserted Infected Computers, generating Component Boost.
guide_window_encompressor:
Enhances and compresses files using Clock Speed, adding the enhanced and compressed modifier, increasing its quality by 2x.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 6x the file size.
guide_window_enhancer:
Enhances files using Clock Speed, adding the enhanced modifier and increasing its size and quality by 2x.
Removes one compressed modifier.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the file size and is not affected by enhanced modifiers.
guide_window_execute_injection:
Provides Vulnerability based on the Hack Power inserted.
Vulnerability multiplies the damage received by breach targets.
guide_window_file_generator: Generates files with the AI modifier using Neurons, reducing its quality by 10x and increasing value by 1000000x.
guide_window_fix_code: Fixes inserted code using a Bug Fix Code, removing the bugged modifier, which reduces quality by 4x.
guide_window_game_engine:
Makes Game files out of Videos and Programs using Clock Speed. Resulting games inherits similar modifiers between used videos and programs.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the Game size.
guide_window_gpu_cluster: Hardware-type node. Generates multiple GPU Speed values based on its level and GPU count; its level can be upgraded with Money to enhance all GPU performance, and its GPU count can be upgraded with Money to increase output quantity. GPU Speed is measured in hertz (Hz), representing cycles (C) per second, and can also be boosted using Component Boost.
guide_window_hacker: Provides Hack Power based on your Hacking Level. Hacking Level can be upgraded by inserting Hack Experience.
guide_window_heat_sink: Dissipates Heat generated from components based on its level, which can be upgraded using Money.
guide_window_mine_token: Mines Tokens using GPU Speed. The cycle requirement increases exponentially for each Token mined, and does not reset when entering the Portal.
guide_window_movie_maker:
Makes Video files out of Images and Sounds using Clock Speed. Resulting videos inherits similar modifiers between used images and sounds.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the video size.
guide_window_movie_renderer:
Makes Video files out of Images and Sounds using GPU Speed. Videos inherits similar modifiers between converted images and sounds.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the video size.
guide_window_network: Hardware-type node. Generates Download and Upload Speed based on its level, which can be increased with Money, and its performance can be further boosted by Component Boost.
guide_window_optimize_code:
Optimizes inserted code using an Optimization Code, adding the optimized modifier and increasing quality by 4x.
Modifiers of the Optimization Code are also applied to the code being optimized.
guide_window_overclocker: Allows to set the desired Overclock amount to be used on components.
guide_window_payload_launcher:
Generates Payload Damage based on 100% of Hack Power. 
Damages breach targets and gets consumed afterwards.
guide_window_processing_seller: Periodically generates Money based on the amount of Clock Speed inserted.
guide_window_processor: Hardware-type node. Generates multiple Clock Speed values based on its level and core count; its level can be upgraded with Money to enhance all core performance, and its core count can be upgraded with Money to increase output quantity. Clock Speed is measured in hertz (Hz), representing cycles (C) per second, and can also be boosted using Component Boost.
guide_window_quarantine:
Removes the infected modifier from files using Clock Speed.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the file size.
guide_window_redownloader:
Redownloads files using Download Speed, removing applied modifiers, including corruption and adding the verified modifier that increases its value by 4x.
Download size is based on the file size.
guide_window_refiner:
Refines files using Clock Speed, adding the refined modifier and increasing research yield by 2x.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the file size.
guide_window_ripper:
Rips Game files using Clock Speed, outputting 200 Program files.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the game size.
guide_window_scrapper:
Scraps Game files using Clock Speed, outputting 20k Video files.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 2x the game size.
guide_window_server: Periodically generates Money based on inserted Upload Speed, with income scaling proportionally to the value per bit of the inserted storage.
guide_window_store_file: Stores files in a storage to be mounted on a Server. The storage inherits the file's modifiers.
guide_window_torrent_browser: Browses the internet for torrents using Download Speed. Each level unlocks a new format and increases the amount of torrents found, but raises bandwidth requirement by 100x.
guide_window_torrent_downloader:
Downloads files with the modifiers of the inserted torrent using Download Speed.
Download size is based on the resulting file size.
guide_window_trainer:
Generates Neurons for the format and modifier of the inserted file using GPU Speed.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on 3x the file size.
guide_window_trojan_injector:
Injects trojans in inserted files using Clock Speed, adding the Trojan-Injected modifier and allowing it to receive Infected Computers on upload.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the file size.
guide_window_uploader: Uploads files using Upload Speed in exchange for Money, deleting the files in the process.
guide_window_variable_combiner:
Combines two inserted primitive variables into an advanced variable.
BitFlag = bool + int
BigInt = int + int
Decimal = int + float
String = char + char
Vector = float + float
guide_window_verifier:
Checks file's integrity for corruption using Clock Speed, adding the verified modifier and increasing its value by 4x. It also has a 50% chance of being corrupted, reducing its value by 10x and size by 5x
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the file size.
guide_window_virus_extractor:
Extracts viruses from infected files using Clock Speed, destroying the file in the process.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the file size.
guide_window_virus_scanner:
Scans files for viruses using Clock Speed, adding the scanned modifier and increasing its value by 4x. It also has a 50% chance of being infected, reducing its value by 4x.
The amount of cycles (C) required is based on the file size.
menu_sync_save_desc: Synchronize your save data across devices
menu_sync_save_instructions: Press Export to receive a code, or insert a code to import
menu_watch_ad_desc: Watch a quick advertisement and receive rewards
menu_wipe_desc: Would you like to reset all your progress, including achievements?
no_schematics_saved: You don't have any schematics yet
password_reset_sent: Password reset email sent. Check your inbox
password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
perk_antivirus_pro_desc: Unlocks the Antivirus Pro, which scans and removes virus from files
perk_auto_collect_desc: Unlocks the Auto Collector, which automatically collects inserted resources
perk_automated_crypto_seller_desc: Unlocks the Auto Crypto Seller, which sells Coins in exchange for Money
perk_download_manager_desc: Unlocks the Download Manager, allowing all files to be downloaded with specified ratios
perk_groups_desc: Unlocks the Node Group, allowing nodes to be grouped and moved together
perk_ide_desc: Unlocks the IDE, allowing variables to be coded with specified ratios
perk_max_rest_time_desc: Increases Rest Time capacity by 30 seconds
perk_mine_tether_desc: Unlocks Tether mining, a stable coin that is automatically converted into Money
perk_network_limiter_desc: Unlocks the Network Limiter, allowing Download and Upload to be split in different ratios
perk_plus_laboratory_desc: Increases Data Lab node limit by 1
perk_thread_manager_desc: Unlocks the Thread Manager, allowing Clock Speed to be split in different ratios
perk_token_multiplier_desc: Increases token gain from random spawns by 1
placement_error: One or more nodes could not be placed
premium_ad_remover_desc:
Converts ADs into Tokens automatically
+1 Support Level
premium_chronomancer_desc:
Doubles Rest Time production and capacity
Produce Rest Time while online
+1 Support Level
premium_daily_tokens_desc:
Instantly receive 1400 Tokens
Receive 200 Tokens daily
+1 Support Level
premium_daily_tokens_plus_desc:
Instantly receive 2100 Tokens
Receive 300 Tokens daily
+1 Support Level
premium_soundtrack_desc:
Gives access to the soundtrack download, mixed for optimal listening
+1 Support Level
privacy_policy_accept: By pressing Register, you agree to our {privacy_policy}
prompt_application_reset_desc: This service will remove all applications unlocked, removing all nodes associated with it, as well as refunding Application Points used
prompt_delete_node_desc: Deleted nodes will also delete all resources and upgrades contained
prompt_enter_portal_desc: Would you like to enter the portal now and claim queued upgrades?
prompt_hack_reset_desc: This service will remove all your hack upgrades and refund Hack Points used
prompt_load_save_desc: Load this save now? Any unsaved progress will be lost
prompt_optimization_reset_desc: This service will remove all optimizations done and refund Optimization Points used
prompt_overwrite_save_desc: Overwrite this save? This action cannot be undone
prompt_portal_reset_desc: This service will force a Portal entry, removing all Portal upgrades that are active and queued, as well as refunding all Advanced Research
prompt_portal_warning: This will reset your desktop and upgrades
prompt_update_2.0_desc:
2.0 introduces new content, features, balance changes and a progression overhaul.

This is a great opportunity to start over and experience the game like it was your first time. Prefer to keep your progress? No problem! You can keep playing your current save with all the new content.

Would you like to start over?
registration_successful: Verification email sent. Check your inbox
research_agi_desc: Unlocks an AGI that can boost productivity based on its neuron count
research_ai_desc: Unlocks access to AI training to generate neurons from files, which can be used to generate AI files with custom modifiers
research_analysis_desc: Unlocks the Pre-analyzer, which pre-analyzes files to increase research speed
research_applications_desc: Unlocks access to Arrays and application coding
research_assembly_desc: Unlocks assemblers that can automate the production of Routers, CPU Cores and GPUs
research_bitcoin_desc: Unlocks the ability to mine Bitcoin, a coin with medium volatility
research_breach_bank_desc: Unlocks the ability to breach banks and steal Tokens
research_breach_corporation_desc: Unlocks the ability to breach corporations and steal secret data for money purposes
research_breach_government_desc: Unlocks the ability to breach public institutions and steal intel for research purposes
research_breach_time_desc: Increases breach time limit by 1 second
research_build_tools_desc: Unlocks the ability to build code and install it in your system for different upgrades based on the code type
research_charged_attack_desc: Unlocks the Charged Attack skill, allowing damage to be charged for a super attack
research_code_optimization_desc: Unlocks access to code optimizations, which optimizes code for increased quality
research_coin_value_desc: Multiplicatively increases income from cryptocurrency by 100%
research_compression_level_desc: Increases maximum compression count on files by 1
research_constant_learning_desc: Every second generate 5% Hack Experience of the reward of the highest Anonymous threat breached
research_cooling_desc: Unlocks the Heat Sink, allowing Heat produced from overclocking to be dissipated
research_critical_payload_desc: Unlocks the Critical Payload skill, allowing Payload Damage to have a chance of greatly increasing its power
research_data_leak_desc: Every second generate 5% Corporation Data of the reward of the highest Corporation threat breached
research_data_leftovers_desc: Gain one additional Research for every file researched
research_debugging_desc: Unlocks access to debugging, which tests code for possible bugs, increasing its quality
research_decryption_desc: Unlocks the Decryptor, allowing encrypted files to be decrypted for increased quality
research_distillation_desc: Unlocks the Distillator, which distills file data for improved neuron production
research_driver_requirement_desc: Reduces Driver build requirement growth by 5%
research_drivers_desc: Unlocks access to HashMaps and driver coding
research_enhancement_level_desc: Increases maximum enhancement count on files by 1
research_ethereum_desc: Unlocks the ability to mine Ethereum, a coin with high volatility
research_fame_desc: Grants 10% increased income from all sources for each upload request completed
research_file_processing_desc: Unlocks the Compressor and the Enhancer, allowing files to be compressed in size or enhanced for greater quality
research_ghost_attack_desc: Unlocks the Ghost Attack skill, allowing any damage to ignore the Firewall
research_gpu_desc: Unlocks the GPU Cluster hardware and the ability to mine and sell cryptocurrencies
research_gpu_heat_desc: Reduces Heat generated from GPU Clusters by 20%
research_gpu_manager_desc: Allows GPU Speed to be split with user controlled ratios
research_gpu_threading_desc: Increases GPU Speed by 20% for each GPU unlocked
research_hack_skills_desc: Unlocks access to nodes that empower your breach attacks. You can only have one skill active. Each level allows you to research a skill of your choice
research_improved_learning_desc: Grants an additional Hack Point every 2 levels
research_infect_payload_desc: Unlocks the Infect Payload skill, allowing Payload Damage to get extra Infection Damage
research_infection_damage_desc: Unlocks the ability to build Infection Damage
research_injection_desc: Unlocks the Expose Weakness node, causing breach targets to take more damage based on Hack Power
research_intel_leak_desc: Every second generate 5% Governmental Intel of the reward of the highest Government threat breached
research_malice_desc: Multiplicatively increases Infected Computers gain by 100%
research_milling_desc: Unlocks the production of Wires through milling
research_modular_components_desc: Allows the purchase of Routers, CPU Cores and GPUs that can be installed in their respective nodes for infinite scaling
research_network_desc: Unlocks the Network hardware and the ability to download and upload files
research_network_exchanger_desc: Converts Upload Speed into Download Speed and Download Speed into Upload Speed
research_network_heat_desc: Reduces Heat generated from Networks by 20%
research_network_merging_desc: Unlocks Download and Upload Mergers, allowing both speeds to be combined into a single speed
research_network_speed_desc: Multiplicatively increases Download and Upload Speed by 100%
research_oil_refining_desc: Unlocks the production of Refined Oil through refining
research_optimization_level_desc: Increases the maximum amount of optimizations in a code by 1
research_optimizations_desc: Unlocks access to variable combinations and optimization coding
research_overclocking_desc: Unlocks the ability to set overclock on components, boosting performance
research_plus_core_desc: Start with an additional CPU Core unlocked
research_plus_gpu_desc: Start with an additional GPU unlocked
research_polymerization_desc: Unlocks the production of Plastics through polymerization
research_portal_desc: Unlocks access to the Dimensional Portal and the ability to convert Research into Advanced Research, which is used to queue Portal upgrades
research_primary_core_speed_desc: Increases Clock Speed of the primary CPU Core by 100%
research_process_value_desc: Multiplicatively increases income from the Processing Seller by 100%
research_processor_desc: Unlocks the Processor hardware and the ability to sell processing power
research_processor_heat_desc: Reduces Heat generated from Processors by 20%
research_purification_desc: Unlocks the production of Purified Silicon through purification
research_quick_learner_desc: Reduces Hack Experience requirement growth by 5%
research_redownload_desc: Unlocks the Re-downloader, which fixes corrupted files to increase its value
research_refinement_desc: Unlocks the Data Refiner, which refines files for increased research value
research_research_desc: Unlocks the Data Lab, which generates Research to permanently unlock new technologies
research_scheduler_desc: Unlocks the Scheduler, allowing GPU Speed to be converted into Clock Speed
research_server_desc: Allows for massive amounts of data to be stored and delivered via Servers that generate income based on stored files
research_soldering_desc: Unlocks the production of PCBs through soldering
research_split_attack_desc: Unlocks the Split Attack node, which allows multiple targets to be attacked simultaneously
research_spread_infection_desc: Unlocks the Spread Infection skill, allowing Infection Damage to multiply itself inside the host
research_stamping_desc: Unlocks the production of Copper Plates through stamping
research_statistics_desc: Grants 10% increased Research for each research unlocked
research_sync_efficiency_desc: Doubles Clock Speed granted by GPU Speed when using the Task Scheduler
research_synchronizer_desc: Unlocks Synchronizer nodes, allowing CPU Cores and GPUs to work synchronously
research_threading_desc: Increases Clock Speed by 20% for each CPU Core unlocked
research_token_mining_desc: Unlocks the ability to mine Tokens
research_torrents_analyzed_desc: Unlocks torrent browsing for pre-analyzed files
research_torrents_desc: Unlocks torrent browsing and downloading. Each level allows you to research a browser of your choice
research_torrents_encrypted_desc: Unlocks torrent browsing for encrypted files
research_torrents_scanned_desc: Unlocks torrent browsing for scanned files
research_torrents_verified_desc: Unlocks torrent browsing for validated files
research_trojan_desc: Allows Virus from infected files to be extracted and manipulated into Trojans, which can be injected in files and uploaded to drain infected computers for boosting
research_upload_value_desc: Multiplicatively increases income from uploads by 100%
research_verifier_desc: Unlocks the Verifier, which validates file integrity to increase its value
research_wafer_cutting_desc: Unlocks the production of Transistors by cutting Wafers
research_wafer_synthesis_desc: Unlocks the production of Wafer through synthesis
resource_array_bigint_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of BigInt.
resource_array_bitflag_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of BitFlag.
resource_array_bool_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of bool.
resource_array_char_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of char.
resource_array_decimal_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of Decimal.
resource_array_float_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of float.
resource_array_int_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of int.
resource_array_string_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of String.
resource_array_vector_desc: Array variable produced from a collection of Vector.
resource_bigint_desc: Complex variable produced from coding using int + int.
resource_bitcoin_desc: Mined cryptocoin (medium volatility); sells for {2.0e8} Money.
resource_bitflag_desc: Complex variable produced from coding using bool + int.
resource_bool_desc: Primitive type variable produced from coding.
resource_char_desc: Primitive type variable produced from coding.
resource_code_application_desc: Code for applications; can be committed in exchange for Contribution or built for Application Points.
resource_code_bugfix_desc: Code for fixing bugs. Can be used in a "Fix Code" node to remove a bugged modifier
resource_code_driver_desc: Code for drivers; can be committed for reputation and built for hardware upgrades.
resource_code_optimization_desc: Code for optimizing other codes; can be committed in exchange for Contribution or built for Optimization Points.
resource_code_speed_desc: Variable coding speed that scales with Contribution Level.
resource_contribution_desc: Increases Contribution Level; obtained by committing code.
resource_copper_plate_desc: Plate made out of Copper through stamping. Can be used in a Wire Mill to make Wires.
resource_corporation_data_desc: Obtained by breaching Corporations; used for breach upgrades.
resource_cpu_core_desc:
Modular hardware that can be installed in a Processor to provide bonus Clock Speed.
Bonus scales with the square root of the amount of CPU Cores used.
resource_decimal_desc: Complex variable produced from coding using int + float.
resource_ethereum_desc: Mined cryptocoin (high volatility); sells for {6.0e7} Money.
resource_float_desc: Primitive type variable produced from coding.
resource_game_desc: Game file used in uploading and research.
resource_government_data_desc: Obtained by breaching Government institutions; used for breach upgrades.
resource_gpu_desc:
Modular hardware that can be installed in a GPU Cluster to provide bonus GPU Speed.
Bonus scales with the square root of the amount of GPUs used.
resource_hack_experience_desc: Increases Hack Level; obtained by breaching Anonymous.
resource_hack_power_desc: Breaching speed that scales with Hack Level.
resource_hashmap_bigint_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[BigInt].
resource_hashmap_bitflag_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[BitFlag].
resource_hashmap_bool_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[bool].
resource_hashmap_char_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[char].
resource_hashmap_decimal_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[Decimal].
resource_hashmap_float_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[float].
resource_hashmap_int_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[int].
resource_hashmap_string_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[String].
resource_hashmap_vector_desc: HashMap variable produced from an Array[String] and an Array[Vector].
resource_image_desc: Image file used in uploading and research.
resource_infected_computer_desc: Obtained by infiltrating computers with Trojans.
resource_infection_damage_desc: Damages breach targets without being consumed; produced using Hack Power.
resource_int_desc: Primitive type variable produced from coding.
resource_litecoin_desc: Mined cryptocoin (low volatility); sells for {1.2e6} Money.
resource_neuron_game_desc: Produced from AI training on Game files.
resource_neuron_image_desc: Produced from AI training on Image files.
resource_neuron_program_desc: Produced from AI training on Program files.
resource_neuron_sound_desc: Produced from AI training on Sound files.
resource_neuron_text_desc: Produced from AI training on Text files.
resource_neuron_video_desc: Produced from AI training on Video files.
resource_oil_desc: Extracted oil in liters that can be used in hardware production after refinement.
resource_payload_damage_desc: Damages breach targets, getting consumed in the process; produced using Hack Power.
resource_pcb_desc: Printed Circuit Board made out of Plastic and soldered with Wires. Used in hardware production.
resource_program_desc: Program file used in uploading and research.
resource_purified_silicon_desc: Silicon that has been purified and ready to be used in a Wafer Synthesizer.
resource_refined_oil_desc: Oil that has been refined. Used in Plastic production through a Polymerizer.
resource_research_power_desc: Rate of files researched per second.
resource_router_desc:
Modular hardware that can be installed in a Network to provide bonus Download and Upload Speed.
Bonus scales with the square root of the amount of Routers used.
resource_silicon_desc: Essential metalloid used in Wafer production after purification.
resource_sound_desc: Sound file used in uploading and research.
resource_storage_desc: Storage unit with capacity to {1.0e26} of data. Can be used in a Server for income.
resource_string_desc: Complex variable produced from coding using char + char.
resource_text_desc: Text file used in uploading and research.
resource_token_desc: Rare currency for unique perks, boosts, and services.
resource_torrent_game_desc: Torrent that can be used to download Game files of higher quality.
resource_torrent_image_desc: Torrent that can be used to download Image files of higher quality.
resource_torrent_program_desc: Torrent that can be used to download Program files of higher quality.
resource_torrent_sound_desc: Torrent that can be used to download Sound files of higher quality.
resource_torrent_text_desc: Torrent that can be used to download Text files of higher quality.
resource_torrent_video_desc: Torrent that can be used to download Video files of higher quality.
resource_trojan_desc: Infiltrates computers when injected onto a file and uploaded.
resource_vector_desc: Complex variable produced from coding using float + float.
resource_video_desc: Video file used in uploading and research.
resource_virus_desc: Virus extracted from an infected file.
resource_vulnerability_desc: Increases damage taken by breach targets; produced using Hack Power.
resource_wafer_desc: Semiconductor that can be cut into multiple Transistors.
resource_wire_desc: Conductor that can be soldered into Plastic to form a PCB.
resource_work_speed_desc: Rate at which a machine operates in seconds
rest_time_desc: Increases time speed by 5x. Gains 1 second every 72 seconds offline
service_application_reset_desc: Resets and refunds all application points, upgrades and nodes
service_hack_reset_desc: Resets and refunds all hack points and upgrades
service_optimization_reset_desc: Resets and refunds all optimization points and upgrades
service_portal_reset_desc: Resets and refunds all portal upgrades
support_us: Support us by purchasing items and gain badges!
tutorial_desc_add_uploader: Press to position the node on your desktop
tutorial_desc_connect_download: Drop the connector on the Download Speed input to create a connection
tutorial_desc_connect_file: Connect your downloaded files to the Uploader to start uploading
tutorial_desc_connect_money: Now connect your Money output to the Collector's input
tutorial_desc_connect_upload: Now connect your Upload Speed to your Uploader
tutorial_desc_delete_bin: Now press the bin button on the bottom to delete it
tutorial_desc_drag_bin_connector: Remove a connection by dragging an input
tutorial_desc_drag_download: Start a connection by dragging the Download Speed output
tutorial_desc_drag_uploader: Drag the top part of the Uploader node to start moving it
tutorial_desc_move_uploader: Move the Uploader to the indicated location and release it
tutorial_desc_open_menu: Press to open the network nodes menu
tutorial_desc_press: Let's learn how to manage your lab in this short introduction
tutorial_desc_press2: Connections go from left to right. Outputs send resources, while inputs receive resources
tutorial_desc_press3: Now let's add a node to upload our downloaded files
tutorial_desc_press4: Let's add a node to collect the Money acquired from uploading
tutorial_desc_press5: You won't need the Bin node for now, so let's delete it
tutorial_desc_press6: That's all there is to it! Now start getting some cash to upgrade your setup
tutorial_desc_select_bin: Select the Bin node by pressing its top
tutorial_desc_select_uploader: Select the Uploader on the nodes list
upgrade_antivirus_desc: Unlocks the Virus Scanner, which scans files for viruses, increasing their value
upgrade_antivirus_plus_desc: Unlocks the Quarantine, which removes viruses from files for increased value
upgrade_breach_corporation_layers_desc: Multiplicatively reduces corporation defense layers by 10%

upgrade_premium_games_desc: Increases the value of Game files by 100%
upgrade_premium_images_desc: Increases the value of Image files by 100%
upgrade_premium_programs_desc: Increases the value of Program files by 100%

verification_email_failed: Failed to send verification email. Try again later

window_synchronizer_desc: Combines multiple Clock Speed into a single speed
window_task_scheduler_desc: Converts GPU Speed into Clock Speed

window_torrent_browser_scanned_desc: Uses Download Speed to search the internet for torrents that can be used to download scanned files

window_variable_combiner_desc: Generates advanced variables based on primitive variables inserted
window_verifier_desc: Verifies the integrity of files. Validated files are worth 4x more. Corrupted files are worth 10x less but have 5x less size
window_virus_extractor_desc: Extracts Viruses from infected files using Clock Speed, destroying the file in the process
window_virus_scanner_desc: Scans files for viruses. Scanned files are worth 4x more. Infected files are worth 4x less

you_failed: You failed to save the universe
prompt_skip_tutorial_desc: It is advisable to complete the tutorial to learn the basic mechanics.
research_reconstruction_desc: Unlocks the Reconstructor, which fixes file corruption using copies of the corrupted file
research_file_decomposition_desc: Gives access to decomposition nodes, which breaks files into other formats
research_zipping_desc: Unlocks the Zipper and Unzipper, allowing files to be zipped for reduced size
research_torrent_filtering_desc: Allows different torrent variations to be combined into one
research_torrents_zipped_desc: Unlocks torrent browsing for zipped files
research_chain_injection_desc: Allows Vulnerability from Injection to be split into equal components to attack multiple targets
